name: Maple-Glazed Grilled Carrots
author: France C
summary: These grilled carrots have a lovely sweet and smoky caramelized flavor, and are a nice change of pace at a summer cookout or dinner party. Use carrots that are no larger than 3/4-inch thick, or cut larger carrots in half lengthwise for even cooking. One pound should yield 6 to 8 medium carrots.
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Brush carrots with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper
Place carrots on the grill, perpendicular to the grates
Reduce heat to medium and cook, turning them regularly, until carrots have started to caramelize and are cooked throughout, 14 to 18 minutes
Move them to indirect heat and continue cooking if they start burning
Brush carrots with maple syrup and grill 1 minute more before transferring to a plate
